title: [BUG] The new dashboard does not report the expected parameters
body: The automatic migration of an APP 7. x or 8.0 to 8.1 always had errors that needed fixing manually. However, these mistakes were easily fixed because the old dashboard inform us what the information was wrong and what was expected. So it was enough to get into the manifest file and replace the information.

comments.body:
You really want to know what I think about the new dashboard. So let me tell you what I'm living after migration: a LIVING ****
The automatic migration of an APP 7. x or 8.0 to 8.1 always had errors that needed fixing manually. However, these mistakes were easily fixed because the old dashboard inform us what the information was wrong and what was expected. So it was enough to get into the manifest file and replace the information.
